message: Let's be fair and reasonable from the start.
Let's start with an even split. We can adjust as we go.
Meet me halfway between my first offer and your even split.
Let's get closer to an even split, but I'm not willing to give up more than 1%.
I'll give you a better deal than last time, but I still want the bigger share.
Let's go back to the even split. Inflation is getting serious, and we both risk losing out.
